issue.title: [CF 1054] Not sure why this isn't working
issue.body:

created an icon showing an internal cooldown for glyph of the shapemender, which will heal you when you shapeshift, on a 5 second cooldown. this icon is working for all forms except travel form. really not sure why, may be a bug or maybe im doing something wrong.


> Posted by CurseForge user deanb123 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1054 | Raw

comments.body:
In the combat log, the buff that you get when you activate travel form is the actual form that you get - Swift Flight Form, Aquatic Form, etc.

A better way to track this would be with a Combat Event icon:
